level.heading: PETITIONER’S COSTS FOR INVESTIGATING, NEGOTIATING, ANDHEARING (ยง 16-1523)

level.text: If, as part of the Decision and Order, a respondent is required to pay the Department’s costs for investigation, negotiation, and hearing, that cost shall be established as follows:
Petitioner shall file with the Office of Adjudication within fourteen (14) days after issuance of the Order of a document setting forth its costs;
Petitioner shall serve the documented proof of Petitioner’s costs to the respondent by the United States first class postage prepaid mail or hand delivered;
Respondent shall have ten (10) days from receipt of Petitioner’s costs to file any objections; and
The Office of Adjudication shall decide which costs shall be paid by the respondent.
Absent a finding by the Office of Adjudication of good cause for delay, Petitioner’s failure to file proof of costs within the specified period shall be deemed a waiver of such costs.
